title: 刚刚建了个云屋
author: Mr_Snake
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mr_Snake 于 2020-7-10 11:06 编辑 

刚刚闲着没事用MCMakistein大佬的指令做了个云屋
效果如下（建的这么难看，好羞耻啊）





file_1594297272000.jpg (260.81 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-7-9 20:21 上传






为了建这个云屋我百度了半天才找到指令然后顺便还找到了这位大佬的个人网站Home | McMakistein
指令放下一页了！（审核完都下沉了，用个提升卡也不过分把）
summon falling_block ~ ~1 ~ {Block:stone,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:falling_block,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:falling_block,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~7 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"give @a[score_give_min=1] minecraft:spawn_egg 1 55 {HideFlags:63,ench:[{}],display:{Name:\\"Spawn Door\\"},EntityTag:{id:\\"minecraft:villager\\",Tags:[\\"cloud_door\\"],Silent:1}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"give @a[score_give_min=1] minecraft:spawn_egg 1 55 {HideFlags:63,ench:[{}],display:{Name:\\"Spawn Rain Control\\"},EntityTag:{id:\\"minecraft:villager\\",Tags:[\\"cloud_rain\\"],Silent:1}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"give @a[score_give_min=1] minecraft:spawn_egg 1 55 {HideFlags:63,ench:[{}],display:{Name:\\"Spawn Lightning Control\\"},EntityTag:{id:\\"minecraft:villager\\",Tags:[\\"cloud_lightning\\"],Silent:1}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"give @a[score_give_min=1] minecraft:spawn_egg 1 55 {HideFlags:63,ench:[{}],display:{Name:\\"Cloud Center\\"},EntityTag:{id:\\"minecraft:villager\\",Tags:[\\"cloud_center\\"],Silent:1}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"give @a[score_give_min=1] minecraft:spawn_egg 1 55 {HideFlags:63,ench:[{}],display:{Name:\\"Teleport Pad\\"},EntityTag:{id:\\"minecraft:villager\\",Tags:[\\"cloud_tp\\"],Silent:1}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=item] item 1 {Item:{id:\\"minecraft:tnt\\",Count:1b}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=stray] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=skeleton] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=husk] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~7 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=wither_skeleton] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~8 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=zombie_pigman] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~9 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=zombie] ET 2"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~10 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=xp_orb] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~11 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=minecart] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~11 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=arrow] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~10 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=player] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~9 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=end_crystal] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~8 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=armor_stand] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~7 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=item] ET 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @e ET 1"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players add @a ctp2 0"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[score_item_min=1,score_item=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[tag=c_tp] ~-1 ~-500 ~-1 kill @e[tag=c_tp,dx=3,dz=3,dy=999]"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"execute @e[score_item_min=1,score_item=1] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[tag=c_station,r=1]"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~1 command_block 0 0 {Command:"fill ~ ~-3 ~-1 ~ ~ ~ air"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"/tellraw @p ["",{"text":"\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\nCloud House Tools","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":" by ","color":"none","bold":false},{"text":"McMakistein\\n","color":"blue","bold":true},{"text":"Check out my social media for more of my work!\\n\\n","color":"green","italic":true,"bold":false},{"text":"[Twitter] ","color":"blue","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://twitter.com/MrMakistein"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"Click to follow me!"}]}},"italic":false},{"text":" - ","color":"black"},{"text":"[Youtube] ","color":"red","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.youtube.com/user/McMakistein"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"Subscribe to my channel!"}]}}},{"text":" - ","color":"black"},{"text":"[Facebook]\\n","color":"blue","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.facebook.com/McMakistein"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"Like my page!"}]}}}]"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"kill @e[type=commandblock_minecart,r=1]"}]}]}]}

replies.author: Earfreet
replies.txt_content:
其实挺好看的
（我帮你顶上来了）

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content:
tianleoo 发表于 2020-7-10 15:34
用瓶中云不是更方便？
有链接吗

replies.author: 屑-帽-快-爬
replies.txt_content: 还好吧，不难看（比我的越共小屋好看多了）

replies.author: crystalmole
replies.txt_content: 额 萌新不懂就问，云屋是云做的嘛

replies.author: 胡新锐
replies.txt_content: 云屋看起来真的很漂亮

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content:
疾风暗影 发表于 2020-7-10 16:18
可惜只能创造用
纯净服务器必需品（建议不要氪金获得）
